statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level <= 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email, access_level FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'editor') ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC, email DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level > 5 AND role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND role IN ('admin', 'moderator');
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE username = 'johndoe' AND access_level <= 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT u.username, p.permission_type FROM users u JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE role = 'admin' AND system_access = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT permissions.role, users.username FROM permissions INNER JOIN users ON permissions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions LEFT JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE permissions.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id INNER JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email, system_name FROM users JOIN irrigation_systems ON users.user_id = irrigation_systems.user_id;
SELECT username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;

SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM users LEFT JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id LEFT JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT system_name, location FROM irrigation_systems WHERE active = true;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_id FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT system_id, system_name, location FROM irrigation_systems WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT ip.system_id, p.permission_name, p.description FROM system_permissions sp JOIN permissions p ON sp.permission_id = p.permission_id JOIN irrigation_systems ip ON sp.system_id = ip.system_id ORDER BY p.permission_name ASC;
